definitions.definition: An element of decoration; that which embellishes or adorns.
A musical flourish that is unnecessary to the overall melodic or harmonic line, but serves to decorate or "ornament" that line.
(in the plural) The articles used in church services.
A characteristic that has a decorative function (typically in order to attract a mate)

definitions.example: We will ornament the windows with trim to make the room seem brighter.
The editor ornamented his plain writing, making it fancier but less clear.
